actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 so as to extend the tariff filing period for proposed tariff changes and to provide that the Board cannot suspend a proposed tariff for interstate or overseas air transportation less than 15 days before the time when the tariff would otherwise go into effect.

summary.text: Extends, under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, the tariff-filing period for proposed tariff changes under such Act. Provides that the Civil Aeranautics Board cannot suspend a proposed tariff for interstate or overseas air transportation less than fifteen days before the time when the tariff would otherwise go into effect. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1373(c), 1482(g))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 so as to extend the tariff filing period for proposed tariff changes and to provide that the Board cannot suspend a proposed tariff for interstate or overseas air transportation less than 15 days before the time when the tariff would otherwise go into effect.
